articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Wood is out as Parity CEO but will remain on as Polkadot’s chief architect.
articles.title: Ethereum Co-Founder Gavin Wood Steps Down as CEO of Company Behind Polkadot

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The global police organization unveiled its own metaverse, indicating that more oversight of virtual worlds is imminent.
articles.title: Interpol Launches 'First-Ever Metaverse' Designed for Global Law Enforcement

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: While Bitcoin’s volatility has been falling, the world’s leading cryptocurrency has also been decoupling from stocks.
articles.title: Bitcoin Now Less Volatile Than S&P 500, Nasdaq for First Time Since 2020

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The FDIC chairman said stablecoins could revolutionize banking, adding that they should be “subject to prudential regulation and oversight.”
articles.title: Stablecoin Issuers Should Be Subject to Regulatory Oversight, Says FDIC Chairman

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The crypto gambling ring was allegedly linked to the murder of Turkish Cypriot tycoon and casino owner Halil Falyalı in February.
articles.title: Turkish Authorities Seize $40M of Crypto in Illegal Gambling Crackdown

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Several DeFi tokens, including Sushi, Uniswap, and Synthetix, posted significant losses over the past 24 hours.
articles.title: DeFi Exchange in Tokens Sushi, Uniswap Plummet Amid Sideways Crypto Market

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: "The shamefulness of their behavior here will shock you," says CEO Brad Garlinghouse.
articles.title: Ripple Obtains Long-Sought Documents of Former SEC Official Who Declared Ethereum Not a Security

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The partnership with Brazilian payments company SmartPay launches November 3.
articles.title: Tether USDT Will Be Available From 24,000 ATMs Across Brazil

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The WAX-centric game’s Planetary Syndicates let players battle against each other in the NFT-driven sci-fi world.
articles.title: Alien Worlds NFT Game Launches In-Game DAOs to Spur Competition

articles.description: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson  at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a  metaverse."
articles.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Amid questions over its transaction throughput, can Aptos handle a slate of potentially in-demand NFT mints on the horizon?
articles.title: Aptos NFTs Are Coming—And May Put Network Scalability Claims to the Test

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Roche Freedman cut ties with its founding partner days after a judge said the firm carried too much “metaphorical baggage.”
articles.title: Crypto Lawyer Kyle Roche Exits Firm Weeks After Controversial Video Leak

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: “I expected to win, since truth is so clearly on my side in this case,” Hodlonaut told Decrypt of his legal victory.
articles.title: Craig Wright Loses Lawsuit Against Hodlonaut in Norway Over Satoshi Nakamoto Claims

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Fidelity will officially make Ethereum—the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap—available to its customers on October 28.
articles.title: Fidelity to Roll Out Ethereum Trading for Institutions Next Week

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Matthew Stafford and others get the Deadfellaz treatment as Polygon NFTs that plug into DraftKings’ fantasy football competition.
articles.title: NFL Players Become Deadfellaz Zombies in DraftKings Fantasy NFT Collab

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: New RARI token incentives are designed in a way to minimize wash trading while rewarding users who pay creator royalties.
articles.title: Rarible Expands NFT Aggregator With Token Rewards That 'Can’t Be Gamed'

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Tron is a smart contract blockchain that aims to be a foundation for the decentralized internet. In this course we'll explore how it works.
articles.title: Introduction to Tron (TRX)

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Declining digital asset transactional volume and low fee revenues have fueled Silvergate’s weak Q3 performance and flailing stock price.
articles.title: Silvergate Shares Plummet 20% Amid Bearish Q3 Performance, Stablecoin Delays

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Kraken joins the long list of crypto exchanges pulling out of the country in the wake of increasingly severe EU sanctions.
articles.title: Kraken Joins List of Crypto Firms to Comply With EU Sanctions Against Russia

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Decentralized exchanges saw more funds change hands, but #NFTs generated the most web traffic in the states.
articles.title: US Accounts For 37% of All DeFi Volume—More Than Any Other Region

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Fintech giant Plaid launched Wallet Onboard, a new tool that will save Web3 developers time and money while integrating over 300 wallets.
articles.title: Plaid's New Web3 Wallet Onboard Tool Will Support MetaMask, Coinbase, Ledger

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Solana Labs founder Anatoly Yakovenko described its move into smartphone hardware as a 'developer play' to usher in a new Web3 paradigm.
articles.title: Solana Web3 Phone 'One of the Moonshots': Anatoly Yakovenko

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: A tentative deal between FTX.US and Voyager could result in customers of the beleaguered crypto broker recovering about 72% of their funds.
articles.title: FTX Recovery Plan Could Reimburse 72% of Voyager Users' Funds

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Are movie NFTs the next “collectors edition” DVDs? Warner Bros. thinks so.
articles.title: Warner Bros Releases Ethereum-Compatible ‘Lord of the Rings’ NFTs

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Popular gaming and NFT-centric cryptocurrencies, including Axie Infinity, have been battered amid the ongoing bear market.
articles.title: Gaming Tokens in Axie Infinity, Chiliz, and Apecoin Hit by Bearish Week

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Despite the bear market and Twitter battle, Tesla remains one of the largest corporate holders of Bitcoin.
articles.title: Elon Musk's Tesla Still HODLing $218M in Bitcoin

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The group reportedly facilitated the illegal trade of hundreds of millions of barrels of oil as well as military technology.
articles.title: 2 Venezuelans and 5 Russians Accused of Using Cryptocurrency to Evade Sanctions

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Regulation is inevitable, notes the FTX CEO, but the right approach will make a world of difference.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Pitches 'Sanctions, Allowlists and Blacklists' in Crypto

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The VC firm lobbied a federal judge to join arguments in a case it believes could “seriously threaten the viability of DAOs.”
articles.title: Paradigm Rushes to Defend Ooki DAO in Landmark CFTC Lawsuit

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Delphi Labs General Counsel Gabriel Shapiro has uploaded a draft copy of the hotly debated DCCPA, which he says has been “circulating secretly in D.C.”
articles.title: Draft of 'DeFi Killing' CFTC Bill Has Leaked—Here’s What’s In It

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Blur is offering rewards for opting-in to creator royalties. Will traders take the bait?
articles.title: Ethereum NFT Marketplace Blur Launches With Free Airdrop for Traders

articles.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Coinbase joins Grayscale in claiming that the SEC is failing to give spot market Bitcoin ETFs fair consideration.
articles.title: Coinbase Backs Grayscale’s Bitcoin ETF Lawsuit Against SEC

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Emercoin has been offering .coin domains since 2014, so Unstoppable Domains is cutting services to these NFTs and issuing refunds.
articles.title: Unstoppable Domains Stops Selling .Coin Domains After Realizing They’ve Existed for Years

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The infrastructure startup, hailing from former Coinbase and Amazon engineers, built a streamlined Solana development platform.
articles.title: Helius Raises $3.1M to Make Solana App Building 'Faster and Cheaper'

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Reddit generated $350 million in revenue last year and sees about 50 million daily active users.
articles.title: Reddit Users Created 3 Million Crypto Wallets to Scoop Up Polygon NFTs

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: JPMorgan's new executive director of crypto was formerly the head of policy and regulatory affairs of the now-bankrupt crypto lender Celsius.
articles.title: Former Celsius Exec Joins JPMorgan as New Crypto Policy Head

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The price of Aptos has crashed more than 40% a day after launch as investors remain wary of the network's widely-panned mainnet rollout.
articles.title: Aptos Token Plummets 40% After APT Airdrop for 'Early Network Participants'

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: New tax guidelines from the IRS mean that NFT holdings fall under the same tax regime as cryptocurrencies and stablecoins.
articles.title: IRS 2022 Tax Guidelines to Treat NFTs as Stablecoins, Cryptocurrencies

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Alleged accomplices to Ruja Ignatova’s have been brought to court and charged for their reported role in the Cryptoqueen’s scheme.
articles.title: Alleged OneCoin ‘Cryptoqueen’ Associates Face Charges in Germany

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Once a big promise for crypto disruption, Nuri is now out of business as no fresh investment offers arrive.
articles.title: Berlin Bitcoin Neobank Nuri Shutters Business, Warns Clients to Withdraw Funds

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Aptos co-founder Mo Shaikh acknowledged the less-than-stellar launch of the Aptos blockchain.
articles.title: Aptos Blockchain Launches to Concerns Over Tokenomics

articles.description: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.
articles.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap

articles.description: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.
articles.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'

articles.description: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko

articles.description: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?

articles.description: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.
articles.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022

articles.description: Space and Time CEO Nate Holiday joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Space and Time's data storage business, how it got investment from Microsoft, and why crypto-native businesses are looking for alternatives to big centralized cloud providers.
articles.title: How Web3 Data Storage Startup Space and Time Scored Microsoft Investment

articles.description: Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the three paths for DeFi, why crypto VCs are all talking about NFTs and gaming right now, and whether crypto startups should be concerned about regulation.
articles.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: 3 Paths for DeFi Investment Right Now

articles.description: Compound founder Robert Leshner joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the shift Compound has seen in borrowing demands and how it has adjusted accordingly, why he believes stablecoins "will win and conquer everything," and how regulators are approaching the space.
articles.title: Compound Founder: Stablecoins Have 'Crazy Traction' and Do What Bitcoin Was Expected to Do

articles.description: Coin Metrics CEO Tim Rice joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the blockchain data Coin Metrics gathers, who its customers are, how studying blockchain data can cut down on risk and exposure, and the priorities and concerns of traditional firms that are dipping a toe into crypto.
articles.title: Coin Metrics CEO: TradFi Firms Getting Into Crypto Care Most About Mitigating Their Risk

articles.description: Superchief Gallery co-founder Ed Zipco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Superchief's IRL NFT gallery in L.A., how the gallery updated its tech in 2016 to thin displays to show digital art, and why Zipco believes Superchief "shows digital work the way you'd want to live with it or see it in a museum—not on a phone, not on a laptop."
articles.title: Why Superchief Gallery 'Leaned In Really Hard Really Early' to Displaying NFTs

articles.description: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.
articles.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022

articles.description: Chengcai Li, head of business development at OKX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about OKCoin's rebrand to OKX, dealing with different regulations in different countries, and how centralized exchanges can lead Web3 into its next era.
articles.title: OKX's Chengcai Li: 'Theres a Lot of Work to Do' Because Much of Web3 Is Still Powered by Web2

articles.description: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.
articles.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.
articles.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps

articles.description: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.
articles.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder

articles.description: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.
articles.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."
articles.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps

articles.description: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.
articles.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY
